Name: Vida Manglar
Intervention planned: (i) strengthening of governance, (ii) alternative productive projects, (iii) recovery and rehabilitation of mangrove areas, (iv) monitoring
Intervention goal:
1) Conservation and sustainable management of the mangrove ecosystem, marshes, and associated streams.
4.1.3
2) Strengthening local governance and management of protected marine-coastal areas at the regional level.
3.1.5
3) Maintenance and promotion of sustainable community management practices of mangrove forests and increased perception of the value of forest resources
2.1.1
4) Economic empowerment of community groups and increased job opportunities.
4
5) Habitat protection for three species of fauna that have a significant threat category, rescue, rehabilitation and release activities, and identification of methods for their follow-up and monitoring.
Project Name: BLUE CARBON PROJECT GULF OF MORROSQUILLO “VIDA MANGLAR”
